name: BSO
comment:
>>37740018

> [[ 1 ]]

Another swiping claw, and you can't move in time to dodge this one. You sidestep, bringing your blade around to parry the strike.

Your guard breaks, and doesn't slow the attack in the slightest. A pincer, exoskeleton cold and hard like cave stone bites into your ribcage, and you wince, stumbling out of the way to avoid further harm. Tatsumaki and Vision are inflicting damage, breaking chunks off the crawler's armor.

> [[ Ascheritt: 16 / 24 HP ]]

It's losing your attention, swirling around to swipe at more interesting targets.

Then you hear Nel's voice, a shrill, plaintive cry like a screaming child.

"RHETT! RHEEETTTT!"

> Stay inside. Keep on the offensive; now Tatsumaki and Vision can make room for you.
> Circle around front and go in when you've got an opening.
> Other.
